channel.title: Youtube banner?
channel.description:
Hey guys, i know this isn't related to moparscape, but i don't know where else to post it....
Anyway.... lots of us know Excl, the RS youtube vid maker.
Now, here is a picture of one of his videos:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/exclvid.png[/img]
Notice in the top left corner he has a banner saying (look it's a banner):
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/exclvid.png[/img]
Now here is a picture of one of my vids:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/thegoldfirst.png[/img]
in the top left corner it only shows my name....
How do i get my own little banner instead of my name?

item.title: Youtube banner?
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

That’s not that easy, getting partnership means you’ll get payed for the videos that you upload to YouTube. However YouTube only accepts YouTube accounts with either a big audience or a quickly growing audience with original content uploaded frequently.

However if you really insist on trying there is somewhere on the YouTube site a way to apply for it. However if you’re YouTube account is about RSPS’s you won’t get partnership I’m pretty sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube banner?
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

UniqueTrys:

You can’t, only YouTube users with partnership are able to get banners.

how do i get partnership?

Read full topic
